description: Show the full details of a specific newsletter.
permissions: Admins can view any newsletter. Authenticated non-admins can view public, published newsletters with published_on on/before today, plus newsletters scoped to their organization manager/broker memberships or user_scopes (still requiring is_published true and published_on on/before today). Anonymous users can only view public, published newsletters with published_on on/before today.
validation_notes: Requires a newsletter ID argument; it must be non-empty.
